:mod:`slurm.network`
====================

.. py:module:: slurm.network


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   slurm.network.get_ip
   slurm.network.get_host


.. function:: get_ip()

   Gets the localhost's ip address and returns:
   - ip address
   - 127.0.0.1


.. function:: get_host()

   Returns (hostname, ipaddr)
